expo.name: Korty.ORG Mobile

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Korty.org requires access to the camera to take a profile photo
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Korty.org needs access to the camera roll to select photos as profile
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Korty.org needs access to your camera roll to be able to upload a photo
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Korty.org requires your location in order for us to display nearby clubs
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Korty.org requires your location in order for us to display nearby clubs
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Korty.org requires your location in order for us to display nearby clubs
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Korty.org requires your location in order for us to display nearby clubs
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.

expo.description: Wygodny i intuicyjny serwis z możliwością wyszukiwania oraz rezerwowania kortów tenisowych przez Internet, dający możliwość uczestniczenia w rozgrywkach klubowych
